==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|わか|せん}}

===Etymology===
[[若い|若(い)]] ''waka(i)'' "young" + [[専]] ''sen'' "specialty"

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|わかせん}}

# {{lb|ja|gay slang}} A [[chicken hawk]]; an older man who seeks out younger men as [[sexual partner]]s.
